title: Product Landing Page
description: I've crafted an immersive digital store with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Wow.js for an engaging online shopping experience.

title: Simple Calculator
description: Showcasing JavaScript skills and UI design with a functional calculator project, delving into the world of numbers in a concise manner.

title: Temperature Converter
description: Experience my temperature converter, effortlessly switching between Centigrade, Kelvin, and Fahrenheit, demonstrating my web app development and user-friendly design prowess.

title: To_Do List
description: Crafted a sleek todo list with HTML, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript, showcasing efficient task management in my portfolio.

title: Currency Converter
description: I developed a Currency Converter using HTML, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript, supporting nine major currency conversions, showcased in my portfolio.

title: JQuery Form Validation
description: I developed a form validation system using HTML, Tailwind CSS, and jQuery for efficient client-side validation.
